Description: Round-topped limestone stela with painted relief detail: fifteen rows of Hieroglyphic text above three registers of figures.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM Part 5: Plates 1-2 D. Franke 'The Good Shepherd Antef (Stela BM EA 1628), JEA 93 (2007), 149-74.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1914 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 5. (pl.1-2)
